video.title: Durarara!!
video.synopsis: A young man looking for excitement moves to Ikebukuro, a district in Tokyo, where he finds a world of mystery in which the past and present mesh.

episodes.synopsis: Looking for a change of scenery, Mikado takes his friend Masaomi's advice and moves to Tokyo's Ikebukuro district to begin life at a new high school.
episodes.title: Exit 1 / First Words

episodes.synopsis: During the entrance ceremony at his new school, Mikado and his friend Masaomi are introduced to Rio, the girl whose kidnapping they witnessed.
episodes.title: Highly Unpredictable

episodes.synopsis: Mikado comes along as Masaomi cruises for girls, and the two see Anri being attacked by three other girls and a gang member.
episodes.title: Rampant Evil

episodes.synopsis: As fear of the "Headless Rider," an urban legend of a phantom motorcyclist, grips the city, Shinra hopes to discover the truth.
episodes.title: Utterly Alone

episodes.synopsis: A stranger attacks Celty, a new teacher attempts to molest Anri, and Mikado and Masaomi are cornered by the Yellow Scarves.
episodes.title: False Advertising

episodes.synopsis: Strange disappearances rock Ikebukuro and Shibuya, but the vanished tend to be transients, fugitives and others who won't be missed.
episodes.title: Active Interest

episodes.synopsis: Shizuo, known as the strongest man in Ikebukuro, is troubled by his tendency to lose his temper, a problem he thought he left behind in childhood.
episodes.title: Bad-ass Dude

episodes.synopsis: Celty runs away from home after arguing with Shinra, and an exchange student asks people to write what they're looking for in a notebook she carries.
episodes.title: Ephemeral Dream

episodes.synopsis: Seiji's sister, Namie, panics when she can't reach him, but Seiji's date, the redheaded girl, has tossed his phone into a fountain.
episodes.title: Love and Cherish

episodes.synopsis: The day after he saves the girl with the scar on her neck from the pursuing Headless Rider, both the Rider and Izaya confront Mikado outside school.
episodes.title: Never Before Seen

episodes.synopsis: A disparate group is gathered together on a rooftop to discover Mikado's true identity. Meanwhile, Shinra asks Celty to marry him.
episodes.title: Storm and Stress

episodes.synopsis: After Mika reveals her true identity, Celty realizes that Shinra has been keeping secrets about his own involvement and questions his love for her.
episodes.title: Yin and Yang

episodes.synopsis: Relative calm has returned to Ikebukuro six months after the Dollars' meeting, but both the Slasher and the Yellow Scarves plan a return.
episodes.title: Takes a Sudden Turn

episodes.synopsis: After the Slasher attacks Anri, Izaya tells Celty that the Slasher's blade is a demonic weapon whose history is entwined with her own.
episodes.title: Turmoil Reigns

episodes.synopsis: After attacking journalist Shuji Niekawa, the Slasher takes possession of him and attempts to assault Anri before confessing its love for Shizuo.
episodes.title: Even a Stopped Clock Is Right Twice a Day

episodes.synopsis: Kyohei's gang, Shizuo and Celty try to protect Anri from the Slasher's attack, and a shocking revelation is made during the fray.
episodes.title: Mutual Love

episodes.synopsis: While Shizuo rampages against those possessed by the Slasher in the park, the story of the Saika blade and its true wielder are revealed.
episodes.title: Everything Changes

episodes.synopsis: As he and Mikado walk Anri home from the hospital, Masaomi gets a call from the Yellow Scarves, sparking memories of his past.
episodes.title: Out of Your Control

episodes.synopsis: Anri tries to find out what's wrong with Masaomi. Meanwhile, the Dollars and the Yellow Scarves battle over the Slasher's identity.
episodes.title: Anarchy

episodes.synopsis: Masaomi begins to suspect that former Blue Squares members have infiltrated the Dollars, and he pays Kyohei's gang a visit to find out.
episodes.title: A New King Will Arise

episodes.synopsis: Against Mikado's orders, the Yellow Scarves go after the Dollars. Anri's attempt to stop a gang war, meanwhile, only makes things worse.
episodes.title: Everything Covered in Fog

episodes.synopsis: When the Yellow Scarves discover that Anri is the girl who fled from their hideout during the meeting, some unlikely rescuers come to her aid.
episodes.title: Declaration of Disbandment

episodes.synopsis: When the Yellow Scarves turn their backs on Masaomi, he must defend himself from them and Shizuo, whom the Yellow Scarves shot and left for dead.
episodes.title: Complicated and Confused

episodes.synopsis: Mikado and Anri rush Masaomi to the hospital after he's been beaten unconscious by the Yellow Scarves. Later, Anri confronts Izaya.
episodes.title: Selfless Devotion
